name: deddy.additional-right-click-menu
title: Brackets Additional Right Click Menu
description: A Brackets extension that add additional functionality to Brackets editor right menu, like cut, copy, paste. Works on windows 7 too!!! Now support select all, UPPERCASE and lowercase, and some menu items will be disabled if a text is not selected.
author: Deddy Lasmono Putro <caphodel@gmail.com>
